name: Celestial Salvage
description:
Kill as many enemies as possible and salvage their ships to get resources

Controls:

Shift - Thrust Forward

Control - Thrust Backwards

Arrow Keys - Turn

Space - Shoot

1 - View

2 - Upgrades

3 - Warp menu

This game is in active development, stuff is not final and very likely to change.
